Plugin.Details: This plugin provides a detector for calls to Unsafe.

Detector.Details: Detector to detect UNSAFE_CALL bug pattern.

BugPattern.LongDescription: Do not use either sun.misc.Unsafe or jdk.internal.misc.Unsafe. As there class name indicates, these methods are not safe to use.
